metadata.description: Trigger custom action when empty space on a taskbar is double/middle clicked

metadata.author: m417z

metadata.description: Reduce or increase the spacing between tray icons on the taskbar, optionally have a grid of tray icons (Windows 11 only)

metadata.description: Forces the start button to be on the left of the taskbar, even when taskbar icons are centered (Windows 11 only)

metadata.author: m417z
metadata.description: Allows hiding system icons: volume, network, battery, microphone, location/GPS, Studio Effects, language bar, bell (always or when there are no new notifications), and the "Show desktop" button (hide or set width)

metadata.author: m417z
metadata.description: Finally, the missing vertical taskbar option for Windows 11! Move the taskbar to the left or right side of the screen.
